hooks.command: jq -r --arg url "$(git remote get-url upstream 2>/dev/null)" 'if $url == "" then null else (($url | capture(".*[:/](?<owner>[^/]+)/[^/]+(\\.git)?$") | .owner) as $upstream | if (.tool_input.owner == $upstream | not) then {"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"PreToolUse","additionalContext":"WARNING: Fork detected (upstream remote exists). PR owner should be the upstream repository owner, not your fork."}} else null end) end'
